channel.description: Recent content in tools on David Winterbottom

item.title: Software development tips â€“ part 1
item.description: On software development: Everything you create that has a name lives in a namespace. Remember this. Ensure the names you pick are unique and unambiguous within their namespace. If a 500 Internal Server Error HTTP response can be induced from your web app through a carefully crafted request, it needs fixing. Don’t assume anything about the incoming request. On tools: Using Alfred with a well-stocked cupboard of Chrome bookmarks is a massive productivity win.
